description: However while some types of prostate cancer grow slowly and may need minimal or even no treatment other types are aggressive and can spread quickly image. The Grade Group system is simpler with just five grades 1 through 5. com watch v 1Q7ERNtLcvk Grade Group In 2014 the International Society of Urological Pathologists released supplementary guidance and a revised prostate cancer grading system called the Grade Groups. Want to interactively view a slide We have added an interactive viewer to this notebook in the last section. sample 300 Display the image. The benefit of OpenSlide is that we can load arbitrary regions of the slide without loading the whole image in memory. Prostate cancer is one of the most common types of cancer in men. via pip import the necessary packages image and mask directories Display the image train train. The Gleason Score ranges from 1 5 and describes how much the cancer from a biopsy looks like healthy tissue lower score or abnormal tissue higher score. png Gleason ScoreThe Gleason Score is the grading system used to determine the aggressiveness of prostate cancer. png attachment image. Make sure you have all of these packages installed e. IntroductionProstate cancer is cancer that occurs in the prostate a small walnut shaped gland in men that produces the seminal fluid that nourishes and transports sperm. Most cancers score a grade of 3 or higher. Usually prostate cancer grows slowly and is initially confined to the prostate gland where it may not cause serious harm. A Video has been attached that will show the Gleason Score https www.
